title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9978.2 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9978.2 - Scope

State Regulations

Pursuant to General Municipal Law, section
813(18)(a)(1), the
commission shall make available for public inspection the information set forth
in an annual statement, except that the categories of value or amount set forth
in the annual statement and any other item of information deleted from the
statement pursuant to General Municipal Law, section
813(9)(h) or
813(17)(h) shall remain
confidential and not be available for public inspection. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
9978.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
